languages.text: "Только ты и я, Глейто. Насколько нас хватит в этом проклятом месте. До конца".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Только ты и я, Глейто. До последнего ксеносского ублюдка. До конца".

languages.text: "Just you and me, Glaito — for as long as we can last in this accursed place. Until the very end."
languages.original_text: "Только ты и я, Глейто. Насколько нас хватит в этом проклятом месте. До конца".

traits.locale_text: "Just you and I, Glaito. As long as we can last in this accursed place. Until the end."
"Just you and I, Glaito. As long as we can last in this accursed place. Until the end."
"Just you and me, Glaito — for as long as we can last in this accursed place. Until the very end."
"Just you and me, Glaito — for as long as we can last in this accursed place. Until the very end."
"Just you and me, Glaito — for as long as we can last in this accursed place. Until the very end."
"Just you and me, Glaito — for as long as we can last in this accursed place. Until the very end."

languages.text: "Nur Ihr, ich und Glaito ... solange wir an diesem verfluchten Ort durchhalten. Bis zum bitteren Ende."
languages.original_text: "Just you and me, Glaito — for as long as we can last in this accursed place. Until the very end."

traits.locale_text: "Nur Ihr, ich und Glaito ... solange wir an diesem verfluchten Ort durchhalten. Bis zum bitteren Ende."

languages.text: « Il n'y a plus que toi et moi, Glaito. Ensemble jusqu'à ce que cette ville maudite ait raison de nous. »
languages.original_text: "Just you and me, Glaito — for as long as we can last in this accursed place. Until the very end."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a plus que toi et moi, Glaito. Ensemble jusqu'à ce que cette ville maudite ait raison de nous. »

languages.text: “只剩下我们两个了，格雷托。我们会在这个被诅咒的地方坚持下去，直至最后一刻。”
languages.original_text: "Just you and me, Glaito — for as long as we can last in this accursed place. Until the very end."

traits.locale_text: “只剩下我们两个了，格雷托。我们会在这个被诅咒的地方坚持下去，直至最后一刻。”

languages.text: «Solos tú y yo, Glaito, todo lo que aguantemos en este lugar maldito. Hasta el final».
languages.original_text: "Just you and me, Glaito — for as long as we can last in this accursed place. Until the very end."

traits.locale_text: «Solos tú y yo, Glaito, todo lo que aguantemos en este lugar maldito. Hasta el final».

languages.text: 「グライト。残るのはお前と俺だけだ。この呪われた場所で、持ちこたえられる限り。最後の瞬間まで」
languages.original_text: "Just you and me, Glaito — for as long as we can last in this accursed place. Until the very end."

traits.locale_text: 「グライト。残るのはお前と俺だけだ。この呪われた場所で、持ちこたえられる限り。最後の瞬間まで」

languages.text: "Sadece sen ve ben Glaito. Bu lanetli yerde dayanabildiğimiz kadar, sonuna kadar."
languages.original_text: "Just you and me, Glaito — for as long as we can last in this accursed place. Until the very end."

traits.locale_text: "Sadece sen ve ben Glaito. Bu lanetli yerde dayanabildiğimiz kadar, sonuna kadar."
